content.name: Tutorials
content.description: Basic tutorial for the starting player

change.author: Owen Lake
change.description: Version:2 - Version for TC 1.2. Fixed several bugs.

change.author: Ketraar
change.description: Added gamestart check so it will only start in the Flight School Start.

cue.name: L2M009 Crate Destroyed By Player Laser

line.comment: We welcome your arrival!
You pick right moment!
I search for a pilot who fights with honour.
The mission will be easy for the likes of you.
Enemies will be present during your journey.
You have performed an excellent job.
There is no more time. That's it.
We welcome your arrival!
You pick right moment!
I search for a pilot who fights with honour.
You may find things tricky, maybe.
Enemies will be present during your journey.
You have performed an excellent job.
There is no more time. That's it.
We welcome your arrival!
You pick right moment!
I search for a pilot who fights with honour.
The mission could be hard for the likes of you.
Enemies will be present during your journey.
You have performed an excellent job.
There is no more time. That's it.
